description: One of the most popular mixed drinks out there is a&nbsp;Bloody Mary. The smokiness from blending in some Scotch gives it complexity and depth that's hard to find with just vodka alone! A perfect addition for brunch, enjoy this classic cocktail on any day, really but especially weekends when you're looking forward to more food - or perhaps not so much as after your morning workout?
